TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SmartLabelStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法與屬性用於執行智慧型、具規則的資料點標籤定位，以解決重疊資料點標籤的問題。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用智慧標籤時，圖表會重新定位重疊的資料點標籤，根據一組使用者定義的規則。When smart labels are enabled, the chart repositions overlapping data point labels, based on a set of user-defined rules. 在繪製註標線時，會連結其資料點標籤。Callout lines will be drawn to link the label with its data point. 您可以控制在註標線的視覺屬性。The visual attributes of the callout line can be controlled. 這些視覺屬性包括色彩、 線條樣式和線條寬度。These visual attributes include color, line style, and line width. 和屬性控制的裝飾，如箭頭，並出現在註標線的結尾。The and properties control the embellishments, such as arrowheads, that appear at the end of the callout line. 屬性可以設定為任何物件。The property can be set to any object. 如果您設定的註標線的色彩，也會自動將設定的色彩及所定義的修飾。If you set the color of the callout line, you will also automatically set the color of the and the embellishment defined by the . 屬性會控制在註標線的像素寬度。The property controls the pixel width of the callout line. 使用此屬性也會調整的裝飾而。Use of this property will also scale the embellishments of the and the . 透過使用數個動作相關的屬性，您可以控制的智慧型標籤移動。The movement of smart labels can be controlled through the use of several motion-related properties. 這些定義的規則的移動的方向，距離與標籤的資料點是否可將保留在繪圖區。These define the rules of movement for the direction, distance and whether the data point label is allowed to leave the plotting area. 預設移動規則一般來說會解決大部分的問題。The default movement rules will normally resolve most issues. 定義指定的最大的距離，以像素為單位，從資料點，允許資料點標籤重疊時可移動的值。The defines a value that specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping. 屬性會定義指定的最短距離，單位為像素資料點重疊時可移動資料點標籤的值。The property defines a value that specifies the minimum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels will be moved in case of overlapping. 當資料點標籤必須重新定位時，標籤將會藉由移動至少指定的像素數。When a data point label needs to be repositioned, the label will be moved by at least the number of pixels specified. 屬性會指出無法解決重疊問題時，是否隱藏標籤。The property indicates whether the labels are hidden when overlapping issues cannot be resolved. 如果屬性是`true`，而且無法繪製資料點，所指定的區域內並中所允許的指示，就不會繪製資料點標籤。If the property is `true`, and the data point cannot be drawn within the area specified by and in the directions allowed by , the data point label will not be drawn. 屬性會定義可以在其中移動資料點標籤的方向。The property defines the direction(s) in which the data point label can be moved. 這個屬性會接受一個值或位元 OR 的多個值。This property accepts one value or a bitwise-OR of multiple values. 預設值是位元 OR 所有值，以允許所有可能的方向不同的資料中心點的重新定位。The default is the bitwise-OR of all values, to allow repositioning in all possible directions except to the center of the data point. 智慧型標籤不支援下列圖表類型：Smart labels are not supported for the following chart types: - 橫條圖： 橫條和 100%堆疊橫條圖。Bar charts: bar and hundred-percent-stacked bar charts. - 形狀圖： 圓形圖、 環圈圖、 極座標圖和雷達圖。Shape charts: pie, doughnut, polar and radar charts. - 範圍圖表： 範圍、 範圍的資料行和範圍橫條圖。Range charts: range, range column and range bar charts. - 堆疊區域圖： 堆疊區域和 100%堆疊區域圖。Stacked area charts: stacked area and hundred-percent-stacked area charts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法由屬性所指定的區域內繪製點並，所允許的方向，屬性，而這個屬性是`true`，就不會繪製資料點標籤。If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties and , in the directions allowed by the , property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 智慧標籤只能當屬性設定為零。Smart labels only work when the property is set to zero.

summary.span: 取得或設定方向，這是允許重疊的 物件移動的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.

value.span: 一個 列舉值或是多個經過位元 OR 處理的 值。

span.span: A enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd values.

value.span: 預設值為所有 值的位元 OR，這些值允許除了資料點中心以外的所有方向的重新定位。

span.span: The default is the bitwise OR of all values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
